4 December 2008

Game Theory + Network Analysis = ?; An Example

by erich

During one Saturday in the beginning of November, I took part in a multi-party negotiation, which had some surprising results. Out of curiosity, I mapped who wanted what from whom, and ran a basic network analysis.Â  The second surprise of the day was the analysis was really close to the observed results. I hope this description of my network analysis of a common game theory problem spurs discussion about how use network analysis and game theory in combination.

tags: analysis - game theory
